At the request of the Executive Committee of the Depart¬
ment of Audio-Visual Instruction, it is my pleasure to
invite you to serve as an editorial consultant for Audio-
Visual COMMUNICATION REVIEW for a term of three years.
The charter states that the function of an editorial con¬
sultant ”is to advise the editor and the editorial board
on matters of editorial concern and to review articles in
their respective fields of specialization upon request.”
As I would like to list the names of the new editorial
consultants in the issue of AVCR which is now being prin¬
ted, would you be so kind as to wire your reply collect.
j. j. McPherson
Director, Audio-Visual Consultation
